citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), Department of Geology and Geophysics, Laboratory for Microbeam Analysis
citeinfo.title: Progress Report (2000) for Proposal "Application of elemental fingerprinting to stock structure, migration, and stock mixing problems of walleye pollock"

descript.abstract:
Use laser ablation inductively coupled mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) and EPMA. First year assay 50 otoliths from each of few areas, each otolith from the 1999 year class. Second year will depend upon level of resolution found in the broader-scale support studies conducted in year 1.
An NPMR project
descript.purpose: Progress report (2000) supporting NPMR project "Application of elemental fingerprinting to stock structure, migration, and stock mixing problems of walleye pollock "
